title: MonkeyBrain Documentation Standard
content:
The MonkeyBrain Documentation Standard ensures knowledge remains accessible to small local models (8k context) while scaling up for larger models.

Core principles:
1. Visual-heavy documentation with emojis 🍹
2. ELI5 (Explain Like I'm 5) approach for all concepts
3. House/room metaphors for complex systems
4. Clear, actionable examples
5. Quick Start sections for immediate use

Philosophy: Be syntax-agnostic with Claude but enforce strict syntax for smaller models. If a hardcoded smolagent cannot understand it, it is too complex.
summary: Documentation standard for accessibility across model sizes
